perturbation.original_text:
1.2  End User  means  any  third  Party  receiving  Content  on  a  mobile
          device  for  a  payment in accordance with the terms and conditions of
          this  Agreement  for  their  own  private  and  non-  commercial  use.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.2  End User  means  any  third  Party  receiving  Content  on  a  mobile
          device. The specific terms for End User eligibility are defined in Section 3.5.
perturbation.explanation: The definition of 'End User' is intentionally made vague here by removing the phrase about payment and non-commercial use, creating ambiguity. This contradicts the original specific definition, potentially leading to disputes about who qualifies as an 'End User' and under what conditions.

perturbation.original_text:
3.3  plan_b  shall  provide  LICENSOR  with  a  detailed  written  record,
          which  includes the number of End User downloads and each distribution
          channel.  Such  report  shall  be  provided  to LICENSOR in electronic
          format  within  6  weeks  of  the  end  of  a  quarter.
perturbation.changed_text:
3.3  plan_b  shall  provide  LICENSOR  with  a  periodic  report,
          which  includes metrics as determined by plan_b.  Such  report  may be provided to LICENSOR in the format plan_b deems suitable.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'detailed written record' is replaced with 'periodic report', and specific requirements for the report are omitted. The phrase that it “may be provided” weakens Plan_B’s obligation to send it and it also gives plan_b the authority to pick and choose the report’s content. This change provides plan_b with significant flexibility over the reporting content and its delivery format, creating a point of contention.

perturbation.original_text:
7.1  Unless  otherwise  stated  in  the  Appendix  the  term of this letter
          Agreement  shall  continue  for  twenty-four  (24)  months  with  the
          effective  date  unless  terminated sooner or extended pursuant to the
          terms hereof ("Initial Term"). The Initial Term shall automatically be
          extended  for  an additional period of half a year unless either party
          provides  the  other party with written notification of termination of
          the  letter  Agreement  at  least 60 days prior to end of such period.
perturbation.changed_text:
7.1  Unless  otherwise  stated  in  the  Appendix  the  term of this letter
          Agreement  shall  continue  for  twenty-four  (24)  months  with  the
          effective  date  unless  terminated sooner or extended pursuant to the
          terms hereof ("Initial Term"). The Initial Term will renew for a period determined by mutual agreement of the parties, made no later than thirty (30) days before the expiration date.
perturbation.explanation: The original text contains an auto-renewal term of half a year unless either party opts out by written notice at least sixty days before the agreement's end date. The modified text replaces this clause with a mutual agreement of the parties on extension period, made no later than thirty (30) days before the expiration date. This change alters the circumstances for renewing the contract, creating a contradiction between the two sections.
